title: ranked afks
body:
riot can you please implement some system where you cannot play ranked games if you have left a game in the last 10 games,
its getting ridiculous,  1 have had one or more afks in the last 7 games I've played, all but one of them during my provisionals, i was on a 4 game win streak, then for every other provisional game i had a afk, causing me to go 4-6 and i also had an afk first game after provisionals.  please can you try to be stricter about people constantly leaving games, i understand leaving games occasionally but its just happening way too often

replies.body:
Heard about our Leaver buster system?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

LeaverBuster is a system we have implemented in order to discourage Summoners from repeatedly leaving matches and/or idling during gameplay. Summoners who exhibit this behavior and have a trend of leaving/idling in games will be placed in a low priority queue.
I have heard of it yes. But i feel like it is not enough of a deterent because it is happening so often

What exactly is happening too often?

Intentional afks?
or unintentional disconnections?

In your last 10 games how many d/cs and afks have there been?
In my last 10 ranked games i have had 5 intentional afks and i think 2 dc's

I looked through your last 8 ranked losses. I looked at the gold graph and levels of champions in your games. I could only find 2 possible cases of afks/dcs in those 8 games. Did I get my two right?

http://i.imgur.com/pEOs9pb.png

What have I missed?

Yes but their was also an ahri In same game as the vi
its been a while now so i honestly cant remember the exact number or who they were playing but thanks for looking and sorry i may have accidently exaggerated. Those 2 did afk but there were 2 or so who afked later in the game.

Dear MARAUDAUR,
At least 4-5 players lag in my every game since the patch 5.2. Some games I cannot even reconnect back to the game after I get disconnected. Some games do not even start at all and I get leavers. Like me, some other players do not reconnect too and they afk the game from the start because they failed to reconnect.

As Riot pointed it is Flips fault, so I am changing the internet service provider in 3 days, just waiting for technician. Then I can surely know if it is at Riots end. Since this game lags on Telstra clear internet too. It lags on well equipped Internet Cafes(on both internet cafes i visit frequently) after the patch 5.2. 

Every other game, like Destiny plays flawlessly. I can see LOL consuming my bandwidth crazy more than any other high demanding game I play and still lag or disconnect.

Hopefully you guys can resolve the issues. Counting on you guys. Damage is already done, just try to fix it so we can start playing again.

cheers for looking into it.
I play useing telstra and i very rarely if ever dc maybe something is wrong with you internet/computer? Or it may be riots fault but im not experiencing it

> I myself don't know what his system would be but mine would be that afking a ranked game gives you a 30 day ranked ban and sets you to 0 lp.

That's a bit harsh. I would say maybe AFK twice in a row/day or something. Sometimes things happen that is beyond your control.
If you're AFKing twice a day, then you have a problem and need to fix it before playing anymore.

In the last 10 games? Flat out no.

Day ban from ranked? maybe.

Fact is last 10 games is really unfair on those that might only get 1 game a day anyway, making it an actual time based ban is a better idea.

Thats what would make it such a derteternt. But i understand dc's so maybe this only happens if you leave alot of ranked. Also happening before the leaverbuster system. And its not a game ban you just have to play 10 norms before you can play ranked again

you have to play 10 norms, so it can't be in your last 10 games for you to do ranked.

Fact is the 10 norms after **1** DC is bad, for some people that could be a week+ not playing ranked.
Thats the point. Dont leave games.  And im not saying this would happen first game you leave. This would only kick in if you afk in a certain number of games

You must be one of those people who don't read other topics. On help and support there is a top stickied called "Lags and disconnections." Did you even take the time to read those stickies before making an unthoughtful post? 

What you are saying is in your last game 10 games most of the players intentionally left right? And they must be all trolls conspiring you to loose? So they must all be banned. Oceania already has less players, lol. 

Read my 25+ posts that I have made on the help and support board about the recent server issues in Oceania. Even well equipped Internet Cafes are experiencing lags and disconnections due to Riot's ongoing server issues. They have fiber optic speed, and still lag and now think about that for a second. 

If you are one of those lucky few who never had any disconnections ever in your gaming life, then you must be quite lucky. In an ideal world you can come across 2 percent of the population afk. At this moment, me and my friends are all having lag issues and we got Fibre connection too. So easily expect 10 percent or more people could be going afk in the least until the server issues are resolved.

Don't play ranked at the moment on Solo queue unless you are playing ranked team 5vs5 or 3vs3 and you know everyone in your team never had lag issues in their life and then you can climb elo. 

Please take time to read the stickied posts next time, Friend.

Have fun and Good Luck in the field of justice. :)
